name: Xenoids Demo
description:
You wake up from a cryo sleep aboard the Ark 5 spacecraft and discover that the entire team has disappeared and creepy monsters are walking along the gloomy corridors. Can you survive?

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of sci-fi horror. Explore the cold and dark decks of the space ark where death may be waiting around every corner.

Features:

⚫ Two game modes: Story and survival.  (Only survival is available in the demo)

⚫ Several characters to choose from with their own characteristics.

⚫ Random generation of levels. A new experience with each new game.

⚫ The ship's dynamic infection system.

⚫ Collect resources and create useful items and weapons.

⚫ Survive with your friends in cooperative mode. (Not available in the demo yet)

Minimal System requirements:

OS: Windows 8.1 x64

Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2400 CPU @ 3.10GHz

RAM: 8000 MB RAM

Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti

DirectX: Version 11

Disk space: 2 GB
